mapper.select: SELECT u.*, up.gender, up.full_name, up.nick_name, up.address, up.address_detail, up.picture, up.birthd, up.agree_privacy_3party, up.agree_marketing, up.fcm_notice, up.fcm_group_notice FROM groups u JOIN group_profiles up ON u.id = up.group_id ORDER BY u.id DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM groups u JOIN group_profiles up ON u.id = up.group_id

SELECT u.*, up.gender, up.full_name, up.nick_name, up.address, up.address_detail, up.picture, up.birthd, up.agree_privacy_3party, up.agree_marketing, up.fcm_notice, up.fcm_group_notice FROM groups u JOIN group_profiles up ON u.id = up.group_id WHERE u.removed = 0 AND u.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE groups SET removed = 1, removed_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
